snippet: A court sentenced an American citizen to life in prison on charges of assisting Al Qaeda and financing terrorist activities in Iraq, according to a government statement released Thursday.
lead_paragraph: A court sentenced an American citizen to life in prison on charges of assisting Al Qaeda and financing terrorist activities in Iraq, according to a government statement released Thursday.

headline.main: Iraq: American Sentenced in Terrorism Case
headline.print_headline: Iraq: American Sentenced in Terrorism Case
